pitch.cc: Felipe Paulino is trying to tie up Albert Pujols with fastballs inside; Pujols is hitting .000 on pitches in that location compared to .367 overall.

pitch.cc: C.J. Wilson has thrown 15 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 90 over the past 10 pitches.
